articles.author: Winnie Hsu
articles.title: Stocks Rise Across Asia on US-China Trade Truce: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Most Asian stocks followed a rally in US equities on optimism the US-China trade truce marks the end to an all-out tariff war.
articles.content:
Most Asian stocks followed a rally in US equities on optimism the US-China trade truce marks the end to an all-out tariff war.
Japanese stocks led gains in the region, with the Topix rising for a 13… [+303 chars]
